backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing complaint management, user profiles, vehicle tracking, and train routes with authentication/authorization, blob storage for photos, and persistent Map-based storage for all entities.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old vehicle records (id, lat/lon, timestamp) to new vehicle records adding name and vehicleType fields with default values.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features for debugging and fixing live GPS vehicle tracking in TransportMap.tsx, including backend query integration, polling configuration, and marker management.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 15 frontend files covering pages (alerts, admin, home, transport, tourism), components (complaint forms/lists/maps, train schedules, transport map with live GPS), hooks (useQueries with 5-second polling), and data files.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color system for light/dark themes using warm orange/amber primary colors and comprehensive design tokens avoiding blue/purple.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for 'My Belgavi' app with root div and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with 12 routes (home, civic services, complaints, transport, emergency, utilities, engagement, tourism, business, payments, alerts, admin) wrapped in ThemeProvider with Toaster.
frontend/src/components/ComplaintForm.ts: Form component for submitting complaints with category/location/description fields, photo upload with preview and progress tracking, and GPS location capture using browser geolocation API with error handling.
frontend/src/components/ComplaintList.ts: Displays a filterable list of user complaints with status badges, timeline visualization, maps, and rating components. Includes real-time status change notifications and skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/components/ComplaintMap.tsx: Renders an embedded OpenStreetMap iframe showing a complaint's location based on latitude/longitude coordinates. Displays a fallback message when location data is unavailable.
Provides a star-based rating interface for resolved complaints with optional feedback text. Shows existing ratings or allows users to submit new ratings.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout with sticky header, navigation menu, and authentication-based route protection. Handles mobile/desktop navigation and triggers profile setup modal for new users.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states. Clears query cache on logout and handles authentication errors.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time user profile creation requiring name and optional phone, email, and address fields. Cannot be dismissed until profile is created.
frontend/src/components/TrainSchedule.ts: Train schedule search interface with three modes: all trains, by station, or between stations. Displays routes in a table with filtering by destination and formatted departure/arrival times.
frontend/src/components/TransportMap.tsx: React component that renders a Google Maps interface displaying static locations (train stations, parking, EV stations) and real-time vehicle tracking with markers, info windows, and periodic updates.
frontend/src/data/alertsData.ts: Static data export containing current alerts (flood, AQI), alert history, and user preference options for various alert types like flood, power cut, water supply, and weather.
frontend/src/data/businessData.ts: Static data export listing local businesses, startup resources, job postings, internships, and training centers in Belgavi with contact information and descriptions.
frontend/src/data/emergencyData.ts: Static data export providing contact information for emergency services including police stations, hospitals, fire stations, and blood banks in Belgavi.
frontend/src/data/engagementData.ts: Static data export containing civic engagement content including polls, events, news updates, volunteer opportunities, and community forum threads for Belgavi.
frontend/src/data/paymentsData.ts: Static data export listing fines, parking sessions, event tickets, and transaction history for municipal payment tracking.
frontend/src/data/tourismData.ts: Static data export containing tourist attractions with images, hotels, restaurants, markets, and historical sites in Belgavi with descriptions and contact details.
frontend/src/data/transportData.ts: Static data export providing bus routes with timings, taxi services, parking spots with availability and coordinates, EV charging stations, and train station information for Belgavi.
frontend/src/data/utilitiesData.ts: Exports static data for utilities including water supply schedules by zone, power outage alerts, garbage collection schedules, and weather forecast information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration with delegation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including complaints (submit, rate, update status), service links, admin checks, and train/bus schedule queries with real-time polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile, with automatic cache invalidation on updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors including primary, secondary, accent, and chart colors using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page displaying complaint statistics, charts (bar and pie), and complaint management interface with status updates, requiring admin authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AlertsPage.tsx: Displays current alerts (flood, air quality) and alert history with severity badges and color-coded AQI indicators using static alertsData.
frontend/src/pages/BusinessPage.tsx: Displays local businesses, startups, jobs, internships, and training programs with filtering by category and search. Uses tabs to organize different business-related content sections.
frontend/src/pages/CivicServicesPage.tsx: Provides access to government services like property tax, water bills, electricity, trade licenses, and certificates. Displays service cards with external links and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ComplaintsPage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to submit and track civic complaints. Requires Internet Identity login and uses tabs to switch between submission and tracking views.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyPage.tsx: Displays emergency contact information including police stations, hospitals, and fire stations with quick-dial buttons for emergency services (100, 108, 101).
frontend/src/pages/EngagementPage.tsx: Provides citizen engagement features including polls, events, news, volunteer opportunities, and community forums organized in tabs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page showing quick access cards to all services, featured attractions, and a login prompt for unauthenticated users with hero banner.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: React page component for digital payments featuring tabs for municipal fines, parking fees, event tickets, and payment history with UI cards and payment integration placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/TourismPage.tsx: React page component displaying Belgavi tourism information including attractions, hotels, restaurants, and markets with image cards and contact details.
frontend/src/pages/TransportPage.tsx: React page component for transport and traffic information with tabs for map view, bus routes, train schedules, taxi services, parking spots, and EV charging stations.
frontend/src/pages/UtilitiesPage.tsx: React page component displaying smart utilities dashboard with sections for water supply schedules, power cut alerts, garbage collection schedules, and weather updates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting and managing URL parameters and sessionStorage, supporting both regular query strings and hash-based routing with persistence helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking 13 versions of a comprehensive smart city application for Belagavi with civic services, complaint management, traffic/transport, emergency services, utilities, tourism, and citizen engagement features. Contains architectural notes for multi-language support, API integrations, GPS tracking, payment gateways, real-time data feeds, blockchain complaint tracking, and AI/ML components, with one known issue regarding live GPS vehicle tracking.
